questions.question_text: Which of the following refers to a potential occurrence of an undesired event that can eventually damage and interrupt the operational and functional activities of an organization?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
CND book, page 7: A threat is a potential occurrence of an undesirable event that can eventually damage and disrupt the operational and functional activities of an organization.

Selected Answer: C
A threat is a potential occurrence of an undesirable event that can eventually damage and disrupt the operational and functional activities of an organization.

Selected Answer: B
The answer is B. Risk.

Risk refers to a potential occurrence of an undesired event or outcome that could harm or interrupt the operational and functional activities of an organization. It is the likelihood or probability of a threat exploiting a vulnerability, which could result in a negative impact on an organization's assets, operations, or reputation.

Selected Answer: D
D. Process-level isolation happens; a container in hence less secure
CND 312-38, page 1476, the answer is D

comments.content: Double check that, I read in CND 312-38 that the answer is D

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
As per CND BOOk, Page 1476. Containers are fully isolated (more secure)

questions.question_text: Which of the following statement holds true in terms of containers?

choices.C: Container is fully isolated; hence, more secure
choices.D: Process-level isolation happens; a container in hence less secure
choices.B: Each container runs in its own OS

questions.question_text: Byron, a new network administrator at FBI, would like to ensure that Windows PCs there are up-to-date and have less internal security flaws. What can he do?

discussion.content:
why answer D?
I think answer C, patch up to date

Selected Answer: C
Correct answer is C

choices.C: Download and install latest patches and enable Windows Automatic Updates
choices.A: Centrally assign Windows PC group policies
choices.D: Install antivirus software and turn off unnecessary services
choices.B: Dedicate a partition on HDD and format the disk using NTFS

questions.question_text: Which BC/DR activity includes action taken toward resuming all services that are dependent on business-critical applications?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
that are dependent on business critical applications
critical critical critical critical critical critical

Selected Answer: B
Recovery includes actions taken to resume services dependent on critical business applications.

choices.C: Data, interfaces, application, middleware, OS, VM, virtual network, hypervisors, processing and memory, data storage, network interfaces, facilities and data centers, etc.
choices.B: Data, interfaces, application, middleware, OS, VM, virtual network, etc.

questions.question_text: If an organization has decided to consume PaaS Cloud service model, then identify the organization's responsibility that they need to look after based on shared responsibility model.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Answer is A, CND Book P.1553
